result.company: Done. （在线心理健康诊疗平台）
result.title: Founding Engineer 创始工程师
result.description:
We are seeking a mission-driven founding engineer to disrupt the traditional mental health treatment and work hand-and-hand with our world-class product and design team.

We are a rapidly growing startup with an ambitious & strong team. We have end-to-end ownership for every project we take on and expect the same from you. The position is for ambitious people who thrive in fast-paced, self-motivated environments. ????

As a founding engineer at Done, you will take complete, end-to-end ownership of projects across the entire stack. You should already have experience building products across the stack and have a keen understanding of web frameworks, APIs, databases, and multiple backend languages.
result.notes: 如果背景合适可提供 visa
